        public void type(java.lang.String newText)

      • selectAll

        protected void selectAll()
        Selects all text within component by clicking 3 times on it or using keyboard depending on the second argument passed to constructor. Override if needed.

        Warning! In Java keyboard selection doesn't work with NumLock turned On due to CR 4966137 'Robot presses Numpad del key instead of normal Del key'.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears text by pressing End and then Delete and Backspace until the text is cleared.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface Text
